release.action: Fixed download of individual tracks.
Reverted server requirements back to 5.0.0. Only remote control requires a server 6.3.0 or better.
Added iOS 8 and iPhone 6 support.
Requires server version 6.3.0.
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-74] Keep screen on when connected to a power source
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-75] Remove alert boxes from audio player
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-22] Support for remote control
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-57] Download full sized photo
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-71] Hierarchical playlist view
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-73] Pause playback when removed from dock or earphones are unplugged
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-51] Filter attribute for list views
Fixed loss of remote control event handling.
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-61] Configurable main menu
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-69] Missing photos on the overview page
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-63] Cover artwork is "squared" in jukebox
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-64] Use permissions for menu entries
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-56] Add refresh action to own smart playlists
Album artwork is displayed in the now playing info now as well.
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-60] Random playback of online playlist
Better image and track caching using modification checks. This version now requires a MyTunesRSS service 4.9.8 or better.
New iOS 7 icons for login screen. Back to old App icons for iOS 6. New App icons for iOS 7.
Display "Now Playing" information.
Works with iOS 7.
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-21] Support for photos
Use list view instead of table view.
Removed iAd.

Use internal http server for all image request. The http server either returns the cached image or fetches, caches and returns the remote image. This make the special implementation of the imageview with listeners obsolete.
Do not stop keep-alive background task when audio player stops due to user interaction, e.g. shuffle/next/previous track.
Improved background keep-alive. Only play keep-alive sound once every 60 seconds when app is in background and jukebox is active.
Only use play_count 0 and 1 for shuffle mode to prevent new tracks from being played over and over again before old tracks get another chance.
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-48] Back to playlist when playback in jukebox finishes
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-47] Keep screen alive when activity indicator is active
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-46] Support for media and volume controls
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-19] Remember multiple server URLs
Updated database to version 3 adding the play_count column for random playback.
Updated database to version 2 adding the disc_number column for correct track sorting.
Added iAd to all online and offline mode views except for jukebox and busy.
Restart HTTP server on application resume event when not responsive anymore.
Added random playback mode in offline mode.
Set "UIRequiresPersistentWiFi" to TRUE. Set "UIStatusBarStyle" to "UIStatusBarStyleBlackOpaque".
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-43] Transcoding parameter not used when syncing playlist
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-44] Add try-finally blocks to all activity indicator show/hide blocks
Do not display negative remaining time (in case total track time is not available or incorrect).
Offline mode.
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-31] Session timout is in minutes, not seconds (requires server version 4.3.7 or better).
Sync view and support for playback of local tracks.
Added iAd view at the botton of the login and menu windows.
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-25] Link to display currently active playlists
[MYTUNESRSSIPHONE-27] Settings per network type
Same background for iPhone and iPad.
Image cache.
Upate for iOS 6, requires iOS 4.3 now.
Remove protected tracks from results.
Search accuracy setting added.
Support for movies and tv shows.
Use the new MyTunesRSS 4.3.x REST service. Require MyTunesRSS 4.3.4
Update SDK to 2.1.0.GA and fixed a few minor bugs.
Load hires images on iPhone retina display.
Bigger images in album list and currently playing view on iPad.
Use full iPad screen.
Background audio playback.
Fixed exception when opening settings page without any transcoder returned from the server.
Configurable audio buffer size (default still is 2048 byte).
Fixed progress reporting in audio streamer. Needed to report in AS_STOPPING as well.
Fixed display of track remaining time
Added missing transcoding parameter to video playback URL.
Load item lists in chunks of 1000 to prevent OutOfMemory on server.
